source.name: D. melanogaster genome annotation.
source.description: Genome Annotation for D. melanogaster from FlyBase

source.name: A. gambiae genome annotation.
source.description: Genome Annotation for A. gambiae from Ensembl

source.name: Uniprot proteins
source.description: Proteins for D. melanogaster, A. gambiae and C. elegans from Uniprot (trembl and swissprot)

source.name: orthologues and paralogues.
source.description: Orthologues and Paralogues between D. melanogaster and C. elegans, D. melanogaster and A. gambiae and C. elegans and A. gambiae from inParanoid

source.name: D. melanogaster protein-protein interactions.
source.description: 2-hybrid protein-protein interactions for D. melanogaster: Curagen set (Giot et al (2003) Science 302 1727-1736); Stanyon set (Stanyon et al (2004) Genome Biology 5: R96

source.name: C. elegans protein-protein interactions.
source.description: 2-hybrid protein-protein interactions for C. elegans (Li et al (2004) Science 303 540-543)

source.name: D. melanogaster protein domain 3-D structure predictions.
source.description: D. melanogaster protein domain 3-D structure predictions from Kenji Mizuguchi

source.name: C. elegans RNAi phenotypes.
source.description: RNAi phenotypes for C. elegans from WormBase

source.name: GO annotations
source.description: Uniprot Gene Ontology assignmentsfor D. melanogaster, A. Gambiae and C. elegans.

source.name: flyreg DNase I footprints
source.description: DNase I footprints from Drosophila DNase I Footprint Database
